mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TC_ADMIN_MENU_LS ( MENU_SN, SUPI_MENU_SN, MENU_NM, MENU_URL, DEPT, ORDR, USE_YN, DSP_YN, REG_DATE, REG_SN, MOD_DATE, MOD_SN ) VALUES ( #{menuSn}, #{supiMenuSn}, #{menuNm}, #{menuUrl}, #{dept}, #{ordr}, #{useYn}, #{dspYn}, #{regDate}, #{regSn}, #{modDate}, #{modSn} )
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT 1 AS LEVEL , MENU_SN , MENU_NM , SUPI_MENU_SN , MENU_URL , USE_YN , DSP_YN FROM TC_ADMIN_MENU_LS WHERE SUPI_MENU_SN = '0000000000' UNION ALL SELECT 1 + LEVEL AS LEVEL , A.MENU_SN , A.MENU_NM , A.SUPI_MENU_SN , A.MENU_URL , A.USE_YN , A.DSP_YN FROM TC_ADMIN_MENU_LS A , CTE B WHERE A.SUPI_MENU_SN = B.MENU_SN ) SELECT LEVEL , MENU_SN AS id , MENU_NM AS text , CASE WHEN SUPI_MENU_SN = '0000000000' THEN '#' ELSE SUPI_MENU_SN END AS parent , MENU_URL , USE_YN , DSP_YN , 'folder' as folder FROM CTE
SELECT DEPT FROM TC_ADMIN_MENU_LS WHERE MENU_SN = #{supiMenuSn}
SELECT * FROM TC_ADMIN_MENU_LS WHERE SUPI_MENU_SN = #{supiMenuSn} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
